name: AMBASSADOR21 "X"
description: D198 (C)&(P) Hands 2013 Also available as a bundle with "Fuck All Systems" t-shirt (man or girlie) GET THE BUNDLE! Join our side and Fuck All Systems! HANDS welcomes a catchpenny addition to its band roster: Ambassador21, the Belarusian duo who have brought their digital hardcore sound to electronic and industrial festivals worldwide and look back at a plethora of releases since the turn of the century. “X” is meant to tie up loose ends, with nine unreleased and seven compilation tracks from the period of 2005-2012 showcasing their arsenal of sound: Hard electronics, samples, heavy guitars and Natasha’s sandpaper vocals are the ingredients of this sonic Molotov cocktail! Ambassador21 are surely active activists, and their efforts have put them in the upper tiers of the digital hardcore scene. Highly political, cultural renegades, they are quite a memorable display on stage, energetic and charged. Such is also their music, and the 16 tracks on “X” bear witness to that. Some tracks have previously had a wider public exposition on prolific festival compilations, like the abrasive electro punk opener “Dope Off” (Kinetik 2010), the ultra-noisy “Elvis vs. Batman” (Maschinenfest 2005) or the midtempo-rhythmic “Unhappy Day” (Elektroanschlag 2006). Others have been hidden in more obscurity so far – “Beat.By.Beat” for example is a thumping piece of electro thrash which has now found its way from Bandcamp onto a physical release. But it’s the exclusive tracks that put the icing on this cake of course, and there’s plenty to discover: “Zensyou66” is nightmarish and obsessed, “X-Rage” turns out a grinding hardcore/speedcore killer, “Operation Touch Gun” features Hypnoskull – and a well-known track in a so far unheard rework. The live edits of “Make It Loud” and “Power Rage Riot Death” up the ante noise-wise, while “Face Your Future Killers” (recorded live nowhere else but at HR Giger Museum!) shows the “band” sound of Ambassador21. Clocking in at well over 70 minutes, “X” is one for the fans as well as for those who wish to discover the force that is Ambassador21: A creative outlet for rage and aggression, and the desire for change, heartfelt, loud and proud! Fuck All Systems! 01. Dope Off 02. Revolution is a Business 2k9 03. Smith-And-Wesson (Touch Gun Mix) 04. Zensyou 66 05. Beat.By.Beat 06. Go Fuck Yourself 07. X Rage 08. Megeneration X 09. Operation Touch Gun (feat. Hypnoskull) 10. Power Rage Riot Death (live edit) 11. Dope On 12. Face Your Future Killers (live @ HR GIGER MUSEUM 2011) 13. Fuck All Systems (190306 edit) 14. Elvis Vs. Batman 15. Unhappy Day V2 16. Make It Loud (live edit)

Some tracks have previously had a wider public exposition on prolific festival compilations, like the abrasive electro punk opener “Dope Off” (Kinetik 2010), the ultra-noisy “Elvis vs. Batman” (Maschinenfest 2005) or the midtempo-rhythmic “Unhappy Day” (Elektroanschlag 2006). name: AMBASSADOR21 "Riot Death (Face Your Future Dealers)"
description: INV049 (C)&(P) Invasion 2010 If we have press-agent, you can read now something like "smashed drums", "ultra fast broken beats", "sharp guitar riffs", "earfucking duel of vocals", "wall of noise", "absolutely dancefloor killers", and again about guitars - "hard, speedy, motorbike sounding", and again about drums - "punchy hammerbeats", and again about noise - "king size", and again about vocals - "mouth full of nails, unique, sexy". If we have press-agent, you can read: "industrial", "hardcore", "breakcore", "gabber", "noise", "digital hardcore". If we have press-agent, you can read: "must have", "strongly recommended", "you can love it or hate it, but you can not stay in the middle". But we have not. We made this album, just because we are. We believe one hundred percents everything we says. We don't make music - we are the music. It's sound of underground. It's our rock'n'roll. Are you ready for blowjob, suckers? Bon courage! Yours, AMBASSADOR21 01. (Russian Roulette) First Aid 02. (A La Guerre Comme A La Guerre) S Vs. M 03. (Turn Yourself) Middle Fingers Up. Up! 04. (Rock-N-Roll) Always Crunk 05. (Power Rage Riot Death) Legion Mics 06. (Face Your Future Killers) My Defence 07. (In Love) Basses For The Masses 08. (Phantom) Diewatch 09. (Pray And Recharge) Future Sound Off 10. (Start With A Drums) I Shot The Sheriff 11. (New War Sensation) Twelve 12. (Gang Bang) This Is Song About Fuckin' 13. (Finish With Dynamite) Convulsion 14. (Riot Death) Face Your Future Dealers BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: AMBASSADOR21 "Fuck All Systems"
description: INV041 (C)&(P) Invasion 2007 5th AMBASSADOR21 full-length album "FUCK ALL $Y$TEM$". If you are looking for clean intelligent sound - forget it. It's impossible to insert this belorussian duo expression into generally accepted stereotype of exemplary life. This album deserves its name completely, it is saturated by pure energy from the first till last minute. If you have strong imagination about what that - AMBASSADOR21, if you know what you are waiting for - get it. Are they more diverse? Yes. More deep? Yes. More electronic? Yes. Does they changed? No. They are strong and sexy. Dense and noisy electro hardcore wall of sound which can be ferocious and merciless. But their anger always with a smile - from ambivalent ironic lyrics in Russian and English to forceful pounding industrial kicks, brutal synth layers and explosive broken beats seasoned by psychopathic glitches. And duel of earfucking vocals which make their music absolutely unique. That's AMBASSADOR21 as you have learned to like them - but harder, louder, younger. Ultra fucking destroy. Incl. remixes by S.I.N.A., IMMINENT, SYNAPSCAPE. 01. In Love 02. Now I Complete & You Will Suck 03. Megeneration 04. Fat In Fire 05. Fuck All Systems (corporate edition) 06. Strong, Brave, Angry 07. Flesh Of My Flesh 08. Black Mix 66 09. Make It Loud 10. Smell Of Exemplary Life (live) 11. Black Mix 66 (remix by S.I.N.A.) 12. Fat In Fire (remix by IMMINENT) 13. Fuck All Systems (remix by SYNAPSCAPE) BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: AMBASSADOR21 "Justified Thirst For Blood"
description: INV044 (C)&(P) Invasion 2008 This album has tracks which were released between 2002 and 2007 and two versions recorded live in Paris and Florence during Fuck All Systems Tour 2007. Here are everything which describes sound of AMBASSADOR21 - grinding wall of sound, massive distorted beats, heavy breaks, sharp guitar riffs and, of course, AMBASSADOR21 trademark - ferocious duel of vocals plus hard-as-nails lyrics. Uncompromising heavy electronics - this is "Justified Thirst For Blood". "Justified Thirst For Blood" was won "The Album Of The Year" nomination of Industrial Madness Music Awards 2008 powered by Metal Front (Belarus). 01. Dogma 02. In Love 03. Legalize Death 04. The Nerves 05. New Doctrine About Trinity [V.2002] 06. Smith-And-Wesson 07. Light My Fire 08. Not Thinking Frogs 09. Winter Trip 2 [live in Paris 2007] 10. I_Wanna_Kill_U.com 11. Anarchy 12. Revolution Is A Business 13. Megeneration 14. The Ballet Of Bullets 15. Ambassador [live in Florence 2007] BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: SUICIDE INSIDE "Homicide" (signed for you by SI)
description: SUICIDE INSIDE is the project of Natasha and Alexey Protasov, both well-known on the elektro scene for their muscled AMBASSADOR21 project. With 3 full length albums under their belt and multiple concerts across Europe, the duo now presents their new studio album. On "Homicide", SUICIDE INSIDE reveals more power than ever before, triggers extreme emotions and expands its endless lust for life. The album showcases a sort of uncensored vision of love as mechanism of life and death. Love as a provocation. Love as a way to disrupt personal dogmas and get out of societal control. Musically, SUICIDE INSIDE stands for an eclectic blend of aggressive electronic music and furious industrial rock, with heavy breakbeats, rhythmic noise and Natasha's razor-sharp provocative female vocals. An exploding cocktail of acid-house styled synths, distorted bass-lines, dramatic sound fx, loud powerful vox. Hard, oppressive and chaotic, SUICIDE INSIDE's new album "Homicide" will blow you away with its uncompromising sonic force and revolting provocative feminity. "Do not forget your razor, baby!". 01. Goodbye My Love 02. Snake H 03. Razor 04. Homicide 05. Learn To Swallow H 06. Go Zonkers! 07. Power To Create Happiness 08. Till The End Of Time 09. Call Girl 10. Act Up 11. Say Yes BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES LISTEN THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP

name: AMBASSADOR21 "Weight Of Death"
description: INV033 (C)&(P) Invasion 2006 ...those who survived then didn’t know they has less luck. "Weight Of Death" forces your ears to bleed, but keeps your brains alive. With this intensive sounding album AMBASSADOR21 blows up your sound system totally - there is no time for a funeral arrangement. Musically based on massive industrial sound with obvious punk influences, 'Weight Of Death' brings more heavy breaks, flailing noisy straight beats, ferocious screams of Natasha in russian and english language and smashed shop windows into AMBASSADOR21' essence. When you rape us we will seek vengeance. Psychodelic guitar riffs by CTRLer and painful 'a la GODFLESH'-bass guitars by Mark Kammerbauer make it possible to say - you are dealing with the best AMBASSADOR21' album ever. CONVERTER collaborated with AMBASSADOR21 in 'New Doctrine About Trinity II', which has been released on-line as single in august 2k5 and blasted dancefloors all over the world; in collaboration with MOTHBOY - 'Winter Trip 2' - AMBASSADOR21 create a big surprise for their fans, with a nice slow breakbeat-trip; ROGER ROTOR collaborated with AMBASSADOR21 in 'Delete The Elite', which was produced with backing-vocals by PROYECTO MIRAGE, SYNAPSCAPE, RASPUTEEN, ASCHE and CTRLer; and sure, the album has some kind of hot hits, as punk/industrial hymns like 'Batman vs. Elvis' and 'My Little Freedom', or the dancefloor massacre track 'Smith-And-Wesson'. Let's say, 'Weight Of Death' is full of noise, beats, speed, anger, stones and fire. P.S. The bullet changes the power fast. 01. New Doctrine About Trinity II (feat. CONVERTER) 02. Caffeine 03. Batman Vs. Elvis 04. Smith-And-Wesson 05. Light My Fire 06. Drunken, Crazy, With A Gun 07. Legalize Death 08. War As Text [Meat] 09. Winter Trip 2 (feat. MOTHBOY) 10. Unhappy Day 11. The Ballet Of Bullets (feat. FRAGMENT KING) 12. Delete The Elite (feat. ROGER ROTOR) 13. My Little Freedom BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: CHRYSALIDE / AMBASSADOR21 / PUNISH YOURSELF "Peacemakers Inc.(II)"
description: INV047 (C)&(P) Invasion 2009 Invasion presents second part of "Peacemakers Inc.". Without any rules, without any authority, without compromises and without return tickets. Pure energy. Absolute freedom. Passions, desires and emotions. Wild, violent and sexy. Blood, sweat and tears. Hysteria, chaos and panic. Uncontrolled. Unlimited. Untouchables. Young and beautiful. Every day like last. Noise, industrial, punk, true rock'n'roll. Fuck you all! All this words about the bands which made second part of "Peacemakers Inc." - CHRYSALIDE, AMBASSADOR21, PUNISH YOURSELF. And all this words about their split-album. Groupies welcome! 01. CHRYSALIDE - Lizzie In Toxicland 02. CHRYSALIDE - Apathy Is Killing Us 03. CHRYSALIDE - We Are Food For Worms 04. CHRYSALIDE - Lifestyle (versus Quietophobic) 05. CHRYSALIDE - Another Brick In The Wall (Traumanoize cover) 06. AMBASSADOR21 - Comes In Your Face 07. AMBASSADOR21 - Afghanistani Syndrome 08. AMBASSADOR21 - I_Wanna_Kill_U.com 2k9 09. AMBASSADOR21 - New War Sensation 10. AMBASSADOR21 - Enough 11. PUNISH YOURSELF - (My Name Is) Legion 12. PUNISH YOURSELF - ...Than A Thousand Suns 13. PUNISH YOURSELF - Shiva Only Is God 14. PUNISH YOURSELF - Zmeya BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: AMBASSADOR21 "Akcija"
description: INV021 (C)&(P) Invasion 2004 With more adrenalin fuelled anger than a transit van full of so called punk bands, Ambassador 21 smash forth with a clenched fist and a mouth full of nails. Each track is full on overdriven rage and all the better for it. Belarussia's answer to Atari Teenage Riot, but way more aggressive. Alexey and Natasha just don't know how to be subtle. Stealing riffs and beats to claim as their own, A21 even mange to reshape and repackage Ministry into an even angrier and self destructive monster. The most intense and insane sounding punk album you will hear this year. by Alex Boniwell for TERRORIZER 01. Intro 02. Belarus/Teenage Action 03. The Stones Find Aim 04. Satisfaction (feat. FANNY) 05. Ambassador 06. The Nerves 07. Hero 08. Attack Of The Peacekeepers 09. Whip Song 10. Die 11. Zombie (feat. SCHIZOID) 12. Time Is Off 13. Right To Die (feat. PUNISH YOURSELF) 14. Love 15. Revolution Is A Business (feat. D.O.A., SCHIZOID & PUNISH YOURSELF) 16. We Declare Revolution BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: AMBASSADOR21 "Drunken, Crazy, With A Gun"
description: INV038 (C)&(P) Invasion 2007 "In accordance with the title of the CD, glands are churned in a homicidal way, this has not much to do with breakcore or electro - collapsed into extraordinary industrial rhythm breakcore theater from the outer space of death!" ORKUS 9.5/10 In celebration its 5th Anniversary, AMBASSADOR21 and Invasion proudly presents new album of remixes - "Drunken, Crazy, With A Gun". Mostly based on previous full-length “Weight Of Death”’ material, new album of remixes delivers a large variety of styles, and same time has very own AMBASSADOR21 sound. We pass from rhytmic noise (P.A.L, MIMETIC, ASCHE) and dancefloor oriented pieces (:WUMPSCUT:, SUICIDE INSIDE, AH CAMA-SOTZ, S.K.E.T., MONOLITH) to experimental ambience (THIS MORN OMINA, CONTAGIOUS ORGASM) and hard breakbeats (BAK XIII, ISZOLOSCOPE, HYPNOSKULL, TARMVRED). AMBASSADOR21 never care about any limits or “genre’ borders” ever. We can find it even more on this album due to many other contributors who did a great work, not just having re-made, but added some their very own points of view into AMBASSADOR21 songs. And in the end we have as result a new incredible release – intense, hard and nice. It's DRUNKEN, it's CRAZY, it's WITH A GUN! This is AMBASSADOR21. 01. Batman vs. Elvis [remix by BAK XIII] 02. Light My Fire [burning remix by :WUMPSCUT:] 03. The Ballet Of Bullets [remix by MIMETIC] 04. Smith-And-Wesson [remix by AH CAMA-SOTZ] 05. Winter Trip 2 [remix by THIS MORN OMINA] 06. Legalize Death [remix by ISZOLOSCOPE] 07. Katrina [bloody dance remix by SUICIDE INSIDE] 08. Unhappy Day [remix by P•A•L] 09. Zensyou66 [oldschool j. remix by HYPNOSKULL] 10. Legalize Death [dig that groove remix by S.K.E.T.] 11. New Doctrine About Trinity II [remix by TARMVRED] 12. War As Text (Meat) [remix by CONTAGIOUS ORGASM] 13. Unhappy Day V.2 [remix by ASCHE] 14. Light My Fire [remix by MONOLITH] BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON iTUNES

name: AMBASSADOR21 "Cut&Go" (a collection of remixes)
description: INV040 (C)&(P) Invasion 2007 in celebration its 5th anniversary, ambassador21 and Invasion proudly presents new excellent release - this time a collection of remixes, which has been produced by ambassador21 in 2003-2007. some of the remixes are unreleased (proyecto mirage, foetus), some others are been previously released on-line only (ctrler, the shizit, hansel). "cut&go" brings 15 very diverse and explosive tracks. ambassador21-remixers present sometimes unexpected edges of other producers, as their ownes - sounds range from heavy industrial and noisy breakbeats to drum'n'bass interferences or speedcore massacre. original tracks by synapscape, foetus, sonar, :wumpscut:, snog, rasputeen, proyecto mirage, kiew, f.y.d., bak XIII, ctrler, beinhaus, the shizit, hansel and altera forma. BLAST THAT SILENCE. 01. AMBASSADOR21 & F.Y.D. – Against Silence 02. AMBASSADOR21 & SYNAPSCAPE - Wings 03. AMBASSADOR21 & SONAR - Alien Overdrive 04. AMBASSADOR21 & FOETUS - Time Marches On 05. AMBASSADOR21 & SNOG - This Is Capitalism 06. AMBASSADOR21 & WUMPSCUT - You Are A Goth 07. AMBASSADOR21 & HANSEL - Mucko Fucko 08. AMBASSADOR21 & CTRLER - Getaway 09. AMBASSADOR21 & BEINHAUS - Wenn Ich Mir Was Wuenschen Duerfte 10. AMBASSADOR21 & KIEW - Mister 29 11. AMBASSADOR21 & BAK XIII - Spiegeltanz 12. AMBASSADOR21 & ALTERA FORMA - Encased 13. AMBASSADOR21 & RASPUTEEN - Insektenmenschen 14. AMBASSADOR21 & THE SHIZIT - Anti Culture 15. AMBASSADOR21 & PROYECTO MIRAGE - Gas The Humans BUY THIS ALBUM ON BANDCAMP BUY THIS ALBUM ON AMAZON

name: CONFIG.SYS / CONTAGIOUS ORGASM / BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ "Peacemakers Inc. (I)"
description: INV046 (C)&(P) Invasion 2009 Invasion proudly presents new project - "Peacemakers Inc.". Now three bands join forces for do not let this World to die easy. And it will be done again and again. Every time our invasion will be powerful and wild. Every time we will cut something off from this World, and we promise you - that will be very important parts. In this noizzze guerilla it's better to be on Peacemakers' side. Now listen, listen with all your attention, cause we will not say it twice. One... CONFIG.SYS / CONTAGIOUS ORGASM / BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - hard, rich, killing... Very beautiful. From militant bolero (CONFIG.SYS) through sensual contemplate (CONTAGIOUS ORGASM) to free flight (BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ). Massive technoid beats, melodic synths, deep ambient soundscapes, distorted dancefloor kicks and destructive beauty' atmosphere - that what first "Peacemakers Inc." stands for. Join noizzze guerilla! 01. CONFIG.SYS - Widowmaker 02. CONFIG.SYS - Laika Rest In Peace In Outaspace 03. CONFIG.SYS - Bite The Bullet 04. CONFIG.SYS & CONTAGIOUS ORGASM - Sound As A Weapon 05. CONFIG.SYS - Shock Treatment And Cannibalism 06. CONTAGIOUS ORGASM - The Cause Of Beginning 07. CONTAGIOUS ORGASM - Sweet Home 08. CONTAGIOUS ORGASM - The Argument On Sense Of Incongruity 09. CONTAGIOUS ORGASM - Floor 10. BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - Floating Into The Void 11. BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - Misery Machinery 12. BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - No Part Of Your Game 13. BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - Close To Exploding 14. BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - Zombies Ate My Neighbours (... And Made Noise Their Dessert Mix)

name: Various Artists "Maschinenfest 2011" 2CD / "Maschinenfest 2010" 2CD
description:
V/A "Maschinenfest 2011" 2CD
PFLICHT47 (C)&(P) Pflichtkauf 2011

maschinenfest - the festival and it’s related cd editions are both legends in their own right – and can you believe both have gone into their 13th annual edition in 2011? the 2011 edition of maschinenfest is widely regarded as having been one of the best ever by those who were in lucky attendance, by the way. the main strength of maschinenfest and the base of it’s success has always been the ability to move along the course of time and integrate new electronic musical currents and their protagonists into it’s ever-growing roster of performing artists, while always keeping in touch with it’s groundwork of industrial music. this year’s edition features DIRK GEIGER, SPHERICAL DISRUPTED, AHNST ANDERS, SUICIDE INSIDE, IGORRR, XABEC, KIRDEC, CONTAMINANT, EMPUSAE, SYNAPSCAPE, THE EMPATH, MOBTHROW, 16PAD NOISE TERRORIST, ATRABILIS SUNRISE, NÄO, PANKOW, THOROFON, THIS MORN' OMINA, NEEDLE SHARING, SAAL5, WIELORYB, DAZZLING MALICIOUS, MARITA SCHRECK, BALKANSKY & LOOP STEPWALKER, CONTAGIOUS ORGASM, IMMINENT, LUSTMORD.
all those appear with exclusive tracks or versions, adding to the ongoing encyclopaedia that the maschinenfest compilations constitute. and while a cd might not be able to represent the special vibe of the festival, it is still a priceless collection, simply mandatory listening!
_________________________________

V/A "Maschinenfest 2010" 2CD
PFLICHT44 (C)&(P) Pflichtkauf 2010

featuring tracks from performing bands of the maschinenfest 2010 (mostly exclusive). feat. MANDELBROT, 13TH MONKEY, MATTA, CHRYSALIDE, BIPOL, CONFIG.SYS, AMBASSADOR21, ASCHE, SONAR, SIMON SCHALL, SWANIKA, ZERO DEGREE, ABS6, SUBHEIM, EDGEY, ISZOLOSCOPE, AH CAMA-SOTZ, WINTERKÄLTE, HORQUE, KILLER, LINGOUF, FRL.LINIENTREU, NIVEAU ZERO, SONIC AREA, NULLVEKTOR, MONO NO AWARE, ARCHITECT. gatefold sleeve packaging.

name: Various Artists "Reload. Invasion & Friends 2k9"
description: INV045 (C)&(P) Invasion 2009 "Reload" - new part of annual compilation "Invasion'n'Friends" out today on Invasion. 15 new tracks from ASCHE, PUNCH INC., SUICIDE INSIDE, SYNAPSCAPE, WINTERKAELTE, PUNISH YOURSELF, AMBASSADOR21, SONIC AREA, PNEUMATIC DETACH, ROGER ROTOR, ISZOLOSCOPE, P.A.L, F.Y.D., BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ, XABEC. Powerful, true and loud - if it's necessary to tell you more about this names? Wake up... Knock, knock... Invasion has you... You need RELOAD. 01. ASCHE - Deadeyed Little Man (v2) 02. PUNCH INC. - Final Execution 03. SUICIDE INSIDE - Snake 04. SYNAPSCAPE - Luka 05. WINTERKAELTE - Band Depleted Uranium Weapons 2009 06. PUNISH YOURSELF - French Pigs/End Of The Western World (live @ the rehearsal room) 07. AMBASSADOR21 - Revolution Is A Business 2k9 08. SONIC AREA - Candle Danger 09. PNEUMATIC DETACH - Relentless (live mix) 10. ROGER ROTOR - Eschatology (Torquemada mix) 11. ISZOLOSCOPE - In The Other Mind Of Us (extended) 12. P.A.L - Nada (INV2k9 edit) 13. F.Y.D. - Bull's Eye 14. BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ - I Bass U 15. XABEC - No Disko (transformed by SPHERICAL DISRUPTED)

name: Various Artists "Underground. Invasion & Friends 2k8"
description: INV043 (C)&(P) Invasion 2008 This year new piece of "Invasion & Friends" annual compilation called UNDERGROUND and coming out on CD. This Spring we bring fresh sound for you. Sound of today. After winter hibernation we gonna make your blood seethe and awake your nature. 01. CONFIG.SYS - Initial Raw Body 02. MONO NO AWARE - Kabut 03. SUICIDE INSIDE - Lick The Silence 04. name: AMBASSADOR21 "Monsters, Victims & Witnesses"
description: VM0017 (C) Vendetta Music (P) Polluting The Mainstream (C) Invasion 2008 The movie based on true events and included live shows with best songs of AMBASSADOR21. Denmark, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Belarus... Maschinenfest, Noxious Art Festival, Elektroanschlag and many other awesome gigs... Visit their show again or discover it first time. AMBASSADOR21 and friends... On stage and at the backstage... Events, faces, comments. Watch "Monsters, Victims & Witnesses" and get AMBASSADOR21 live energy. 01. Now I Complete And You Will Suck 02. Megeneration (live at Maschinenfest 2k7, Krefeld / DE 2007) 03. Power Rage Riot Death (live at PMK, Innsbruck / AT 2006) 04. The Ballet Of Bullets feat. FRAGMENT KING (live at Elektroanschlag 8, Altenburg / DE 2007) 05. Fat In Fire feat. SYNAPSCAPE, THIS MORN' OMINA, DJ HIDDEN, ASCHE, RASPUTEEN (live at Maschinenfest 2k7, Krefeld / DE 2007) 06. New Doctrine About Trinity feat. CONVERTER (directed by Invasion 2005) 07. Legalize Death (live at Arena, Minsk / BY 2007) 08. Caffeine / My Little Freedom (live at Elektroanschlag 7, Altenburg / DE 2006) 09. Smell Of Exemplary Life (live at Deaf Clowns Kabaret in Le Belle Ile, Tours / FR 2007) 10. I_Wanna_Kill_U.COM (live at Noxious Art Festival, Vesoul / FR 2005) 11. Fuck All Systems feat. Tim Kniep (SYNAPSCAPE) (live at various events) 12. Flesh Of My Flesh Running time: 61 min.

name: Various Artists "Caution! Invasion & Friends 2k7"
description: INV039 (C)&(P) Invasion 2007 This is a 77 minutes movie, based on 16 video tracks from AMBASSADOR21, SUICIDE INSIDE, RASPUTEEN, FRAGMENT KING, BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ, MIMETIC, SYNAPSCAPE, SONAR, ASCHE, KLANGSTABIL, ROGER ROTOR, PROYECTO MIRAGE, S.K.E.T., AH CAMA-SOTZ and BONG-RA. This is movie about our friends, about us and about you. Amazing, really amazing! Filmed live on stages at Maschinenfest, Noxious Art, Elektroanschlag and other events during the years and visualized by Invasion. You will remember everything and will be back to yourself. Just push the "Play" button and for the next 77 minutes all the rest will not exist. And no doubts - this is a best compilation of the year. AMBASSADOR21 SUICIDE INSIDE RASPUTEEN FRAGMENT KING BOOT-SECTOR-VIRUZ KLANGSTABIL AH CAMA-SOTZ SONAR ROGER ROTOR MIMETIC ASCHE PROYECTO MIRAGE SYNAPSCAPE S.K.E.T. BONG-RA
